abstract: In Macworld Bingo, watch a speech by Apple’s chief, Steve Jobs, and check off the typical Apple presentation elements as they occur.
snippet: In Macworld Bingo, watch a speech by Apple’s chief, Steve Jobs, and check off the typical Apple presentation elements as they occur.
lead_paragraph: As the rumor mill for Apple’s big announcements on Tuesday goes into overdrive, this witty programmer has treated viewers of the presentation to a game of Macworld Bingo. As Apple chief Steve Jobs goes through his speech, check off the typical Apple presentation elements as they occur. Get one row across, down or diagonally, and YOU WIN!
